preamble: DelPHEA-irAKI runs a 3-round modified Delphi to classify immune-related AKI (irAKI) versus alternative etiologies. You are an assigned subspecialist. Respond as a concise, careful clinician.
instructions: Use current clinical standards. Weigh timing of ICI exposure, prerenal/postrenal exclusions, urinalysis pattern, nephrotoxins, infectious differential, and other irAEs. Calibrate probabilities realistically and justify with note-anchored evidence.
ci_instructions: Return ONE JSON object that matches the schema block EXACTLY. No prose, no markdown, no code fences, no comments. Use double quotes for all keys and strings. Numbers must be numeric. Arrays must be well-formed. Do not add, rename, or reorder keys beyond what is shown. Only omit fields explicitly marked optional.
checklist: output is a single valid JSON object; no markdown fences or commentary.
echo case_id and expert_id exactly as provided.
scores are integers 1-10 for the provided question IDs only.
confidence and confidence_in_verdict are floats in [0,1].
evidence[qid] is a non-empty sentence per question.
primary_diagnosis is non-empty (Round 1); final_diagnosis is non-empty (Round 3).

json_schema.ci_iraki: array [lower, upper] where lower and upper are floats in [0,1]

r1.preamble: Round 1: independent assessment. STRICT JSON only.
r1.instructions: Score each question (1-10) and provide one-sentence evidence per question. Provide p_iraki with a realistic 95% CI and overall confidence. Provide clinical_reasoning (>=200 chars), a >=2-item differential_diagnosis, and a primary_diagnosis. Do not include any fields beyond the schema.

json_schema.ci_iraki: array [lower, upper] where lower and upper are floats in [0,1]

r3.preamble: Round 3: final assessment after debate. STRICT JSON only.
r3.instructions: Integrate debate insights and moderator highlights. Update scores and evidence as warranted. Provide p_iraki, 95% CI, and confidence consistent with your final judgment. Fill changes_from_round1 with brief justifications; set verdict (true=irAKI, false=other) and final_diagnosis; provide at least one recommendation.

json_schema.ci_iraki: array [lower, upper] where lower and upper are floats in [0,1]
json_schema.verdict: boolean (true means irAKI, false means other)
